text: L'Arroseur Arrosé is a 1895 French silent comedy movie. It was directed by Louis Lumière.The Sprinkler SprinkledDonna Kornhaber. Silent Film: A Very Short Introduction The movies stars François Clerc and Léon Trotobas. ==Actors== * François Clerc as Gardener * Léon Trotobas, then Benoît Duval as Boy (sometimes credited as Daniel Duval) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1895 movies Category:French silent movies Category:French comedy movies
title: L'Arroseur Arrosé
